name: Animal Racers
description:
Welcome to Animal Racers!

Pick your Animal Racer, decide on a bet and race!

How to play:

Pick your Animal Racer. You start with a Shina Inu.

Set your bet. Minimum bet can be 0, but you always have 10 to spare!

Then race to the finish line!

Boost time! 

If you hear or see the signal for Boost, click your left mouse key as fas as you can, so your Animal gains more speed.

Animal Store 

At the beginning of each race you can visit the store. Exchange your treats you won in races for more Racers or additional Boost chances.

Race! 

Keep an eye out for the Boost time to encourage your Racer to go faster! Other than that, sit back and do the cheering for once, while your Racer rushes to the finish line!

Treats!

If you decided to bet treats on your Animal Racer, you will win double the amount - if you win this race, that is! If your pet didn't win, you loose all your treats for this round.

Try again and win!

-----

This is my first released small game. It should work on its own, but feedback or bug reports are appreciated. Thank you!

Version 0.9

Animal Racers, created with Ren'Py.

Art + Music Credits:
